wikipedia_page.main: Drew McAdam (born 4 June 1955 in Lennoxtown, Stirlingshire) is a Scottish mentalist and mindreader, also known as The Human Lie Detector, speaker and performer of mindplay psychological illusion.  He was "The Interrogator" on Channel 5 television show Trisha Goddard and a regular guest on the Scottish Television evening magazine programme The Hour.  He was also the subject and part-presenter of the 4-part BBC series School for Genius, and subject of the BBC Brainsmart project for schools.He has specialized in taking mentalism techniques from the stage and applying them to the fields of education and business management under the title MindBiz.
